product_name: Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball Bunting - Toddler Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When the cold weather hits, the lofty Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball bunting is sure to keep your little boy warm and cozy. Shell, insulation and lining are made from recycled polyester. Puffball-style ripstop polyester fabric with Durable Water Repellent treatment is snag- and water-resistant. 90% recycled Thermogreen(R) insulation uses special thermally-bonded fibers to provide a high level of warmth with minimal weight. Spandex trim around hood, sleeves and leg cuffs helps retain heat; hand covers are designed to allow full extension for little arms. Easy-entry front zipper with draft flap won't let heat sneak out, and it opens wide for easy dressing. Reversible design with contrasting quilt stitching offers style options. The Patagonia Reversible Puff-Ball bunting has a relaxed fit to accommodate layers. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
